item.description:
"Spring" Sunday Salon Mystic Stroll

We have been invited back to our friend Fran Harkin's wonderful Gallery in Mystic for a Multi-Artist show/Gallery talk.  We have done these several times, and those who have joined us will tell you Fran's warm and generous hospitality is amazing and the gallery is chucked full of wonderful treats!!!

We meet at Courtyard Gallery at 1:00 and then stroll down to various Galleries/shops through the Mystic Village back around to Mystic Art Center...We end back again at Courtyard Gallery for a gallery talk and refreshments with the featured Artists at 2:45. 

Come explore a unique, intimate gallery in the heart of historic Mystic, Connecticut. The Courtyard Art Gallery is reminiscent of the private gallery studios of Europe, with rich brick walls, inviting, relaxed environments and gallery directors with personal knowledge about the work being considered. Sunday Salons - where Artists and collectors gather to share their passion for art along with a glass of wine and light refreshment.  The Courtyard Gallery represents a select group of Artists and Sculptors from near and far.

 

Stay tuned for further details on Artist exhibiting and gallery talk information.

 

Allow plenty of time to park...

Parking on street as well as a lot across from the Courtyard Gallery,  in with Mystic Art Center, for a fee
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the entry of the Courtyard Gallery
item.name: "Spring" - Sunday Salon
